title: Understanding Death and Rebirth | HH Stoka Krishna Swami
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.key_quote: That change of body is called death and rebirth, punar janma.
segments.summary: The soul is immutable and undergoes transmigration, accepting new bodies upon the death of the old one, a process known as death and rebirth.

segments.key_quote: For one who has taken birth, death is certain and for one who dies, birth is certain.
segments.summary: Death and birth are certain, therefore one should not lament while performing their duty.
